name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-connected-web-parts
title: Connected web parts
shortDescription: This samples showcase how to connect two web parts together.
longDescription: This samples showcase how to connect two web parts together using the property pane specifying the IDynamicDataCallables interface in the provider web part and the PropertyPaneDynamicField in the consumer web part.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.

references.name: Integrate web part properties with SharePoint
references.description: Learn how to integrate web part properties with SharePoint.

references.name: Make your SharePoint client-side web part configurable
references.description: Learn how to make your SharePoint client-side web part configurable.

references.name: Connect SharePoint Framework components using dynamic data
references.description: Learn how to connect SharePoint Framework components using dynamic data.
